short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a shortcut which attempts to redirect you to a site's homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension which adds a customizable shortcut which when activated, attempts to redirect you to the home page of the site you're currently on.

https://github.com/DovieW/go-home-shortcut
